channel.title: http cookie on 學習筆記
channel.description: Recent content in http cookie on 學習筆記

item.title: Http Cookie
item.description: Secure和HttpOnly httpOnly flag: 有設定時，Cookie只限被伺服端存取，無法在用戶端讀取。 secure flag: 有設定時，Cookie只能透過https的方式傳輸。 範例： HTTP/2.0 200 OK Set-Cookie: id=a3fWa; Expires=Wed, 21 Oct 2015 07:28:00 GMT; Secure; HttpOnly https://www.ajoshow.com/2017/07/19/201707192223/ https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Cookies#Secure_and_HttpOnly_cookies
